question: In which year, India–Africa Forum Summit (IAFS) was held for the first time?
explanation:
First India–Africa Forum Summit was started in the year 2008 as the official platform for India-Africa relations. The IAFS summit is held every three years.
  • First India–Africa Forum Summit was held in New Delhi in 2008
  • Second India–Africa Forum Summit was held in Addis Ababa in 2011
  • Third India–Africa Forum Summit was held in New Delhi in 2015
